name: Jody Clark
text: Great public boat ramp. 5 dollars to launch a boat

name: chris
text: I only use the boat ramp there. Really easy to launch . They require 5$ launch fee. Great

name: Duck You
text: Great fishing!  Wonderful fish camps with people that make you feel right at home.  Beautiful views, waterfalls and mountains covered with flowering trees.  Great place to relax and wonderful place to catch really big fish.

name: Paige Thorn
text: Love this place. Wonderful people wonderful fishing. What more can u ask for.

name: leonard mcguire
text: Great place to launch boat

name: Tracy Harkins
text: Great

name: Gail Creswick
text: We will surely be back!

name: Austin Jones
text: Captain Michael was great! I took my 6 year old daughter and she caught 15 fish by herself.

name: Jason Downard
text:
I have been on numerous charter trips and yes there are some competent boat captains  available and will likely supply an “ok” fishing experience for  you and your family but if you are  seeking a fantastic  trip with an exceptional
Captain  and Deckhand then you must go ahead and get booked on “Hooked Up”.  Me and my family, 6 total,  took a 6 hour trip targeting snapper we limited out  and moved on to other species. The deckhand works his butt off. Deckhand “Blake“  was like a little Tasmanian Devil on the deck. The Captain was so gracious and accommodating, my boys felt right at home on Captain Mikes beautiful Topaz. Captain and crew went out of there way to show my peeps a wonderful time. Lots of laughter and  new memories made on this trip. We had a blast. I hope anyone that books based on my review has a wonderful time like we did. We will be booking with these guys again. My wife is also posting a review as you check out our collective pictures you can tell we had lots of fun and did a lot of clowning around. Just look at the size of this king. Lol 😝

name: John Limbaugh
text: Mike has a great boat. He just bought it this winter. It's not brand new but it's in top shape.i can't wait to go fishing and catching soon.

name: Michael Shockley
text: Hooked Up! Putting fish in the boat with Captain Michael! Good times & great guy!

name: Paul Wimmer
text: Had a great time with Mike tons of fish Stand up Guy!!!! Awesome

name: Bob Rutledge
text: Great fishing with Michael as usual. We been going out for years. This year we caught red snapper!

name: Chris Aliment
text: Had a great time with Captain Michael last week with an offshore charter with some friends! This man knows loves to fish and knows how to catch them. We caught our limit of very large Trigger fish and lots of bee liners. Had a great experience and would recommend him to anyone looking to have fun going fishing offshore!

name: Caroline Jackson
text: Captain Mike and his awesome deckhand, Blake, offered us one of the best weekend's we've had fishing here in Orange Beach. Captain Mike was just as eager as we were to catch some good fish, and that is exactly what we did the entire time! We limited out with no problem after he continuously took us to spots where the fish were biting. Both Captain Mike and Blake were on top of everything all day long, making it easy and also relaxing for us. The boat was beautiful, clean, and comfortable, but their company was the best of all. If you're looking for a fishing guide that won't let you down, Hooked Up Fishing is the only way to go. I highly recommend booking with them, and truly hope my family and I get to fish with them again one day.

name: Patrick Grose
text: Went out today with Captain Mike and his deck hand Blake. This was my wife’s first ever deep sea fishing experience and it was phenomenal!!! We caught plenty of red snapper and my wife caught a small bull shark (she thought it was Jaws!).  Mike and Blake were great to fish with and very professional. I would highly recommend Hooked Up Charters for your next fishing experience in Gulf Shores!!!

name: David Beery
text: First class experience,  had a great time and caught plenty of fish. Laid back, easy going, and professional

name: lisa downard
text: I have been on several fishing charters but this was by far the BEST experience we have ever been on.  Captain Michael Thomas and deck hand (Blake) went out of their way to make it a perfect day.  They put us on the fish immediately.  If we spent a few minutes with no bites he was quick to move us to a better spot.  The deck hand (Blake) was so attentive.  Us girls never had to touch bait or wait for bait.  He was always ready and we kept him very busy.  They were fun to spend the day with even if we hadn’t caught fish.  When it was time to head back in the captain saw a spot with great potential for Mahi-mahi so he had us drop some lines.  My boys were sooo excited to catch mahi-mahi, king mackerel and lots of red snapper.  We will definitely go on this boat again!  Worth every dollar!

name: Quentin Kepfer
text: If you're considering fishing in the gulf it doesn't get any better than an outing with Mike and his fabulous deckhand! Mike went above and beyond our very high expectations. He personally took the time himself to ensure that my special needs son got his BIG snapper. We cant wait to get back and do it all over again.

name: Jesse Gruny
text: Awesome time, went today 3-19-20 am trip.  caught a  bunch of mangrove snappers and 6 sheepshead.  Went on inshore 4 hour trip.

name: Kourtney McCord
text: The best trip I've been on in a long time! We had a BLAST & caught some good fish! I HIGHLY recommend Hooked Up Fishing Charters! Orange Beach, AL

name: Ed Watson
text: Hooked Up Fishing Charters was great!  Captain Michael and his deck hand Blake were awesome!  They put us on the fish and we brought home a bunch of Snapper!

name: Marshall Malone
text: Great experience. Michael knows his stuff. Great for inexperienced fisherman. We enjoyed everything and caught lots of fish.

name: Blake Strawn
text: Went out this past Thursday and got our limit on snappers. It was tuff fishing as the seas were rougher than expected but capt Mike worked hard trying to keep us on the fish. Our next trip will be with him hopefully with better sea conditions lol.

name: Michael Thomas
text: We love to introduce kids to saltwater fishing

name: Shan Payne
text: Went out with Mike Thomas again this year he runs a great charter service and no doubt he is going to put you on the big snapper Made some great memories with my son and friends this year Looking forward to booking with Mike again next year Also this year he has added a first mate great young man and a hard worker

name: Tracie Morse
text: Captain Michael hooked us UP! Thank you for a great day and for your incredible "fishing hole" knowledge, for sticking with us to get our limit, for helping us reel them in, and for cleaning our catch so we could have a delicious dinner! You're the BEST!  HIGHLY recommend!

name: Jackie Fogel
text: My family and I contacted Captain Mike for my dad’s 60th birthday and the trip couldn’t have been better. My dad is a very hard man to impress, and we are already discussing our next trip! Mike was knowledgeable and extremely fexible and a pleasure to spend the day with. I would definitely recommend booking your trip with him.

name: Bill Willis
text: Captain Mike had us on the snapper right away on opening day this year. Every man limited out...then he put us on some fun fishing holes. Boat full of fish. Will be eating fish until opening day next year!

name: Bob Driscoll
text: Micheal Thomas did a great job putting us on fish all day long.  At the end of the day everyone was worn out from reeling in fish.  Great day on the Gulf with Captain Micheal.

name: Scott Young
text: Capt Michael definitely hooked us up!  Awesome all the way around!  He is driven to get your fish in the boat!  My go to charter for sure!

name: Jason DoreyMD
text: Last summer I caught a 35lb Red Snapper with Capt Michael Thomas with Hooked Up Fishing Charters. Besides a great trip he is a nice guy.

name: Matthew Cammack
text: Cap’n Michael knows how to have a good time and put you on some fish!

name: Jeff Lear
text: I've fished with Capt. Michael many times and I've never seen anyone who enjoys fishing as much as he does! Makes for an enjoyable day and we ALWAYS catch fish.

name: p-nut Cline
text: Pretty place and looks to be a pleasant place to stay the weekend

name: American Girl
text: Small and not as fancy as other places, but the owner is nice and the lake is still just as beautiful. Seems to be more of a residential site, not sure how much recreational space the owner has. Wifi is available throughout the site, which is really nice and a community bathroom is available.

name: Jeremy Hilton
text: Nice place with power water and sewage hook ups. The owner is really nice as well and will try to work with you and way he can

name: Van East
text: Is a nice place to live. The long term residents are quiet friendly. Ed is very helpful really good guy. Great WIFI

name: Angela Dover
text: We love it here. It's so peaceful and relaxing. We feel really blessed to have found this spot.

name: DAVID BODDEN
text: Good spot nice and quiet. Good people nice view.

name: Dale Brown
text: DONT GO HERE..YOU WILL BE SORRY..If there was a Negative 10 choice i would use. This owner is very Rude...fixes Nothing he says he will...goes up on rent Without Notice depending on how much he spends personal every month...    And if you wont pay his extorted amount he shuts off your utlities..and steals your things. WORSE NIGHTMARE IVE EVER LIVED AT....DO NOT GO HERE

name: Frankiee
text: Perfect wifi. Great people around. Quiet vacation Retreat. With stores near by.

name: Dimmie Vaughn
text: It's a beautiful place. Camping, fishing, boating and a great hotel too.. The showers in the campground are hot and clean. There's a pool when you stay in the hotel, the rooms are clean and cozy!! I have not one bad thing to say its great.. Nice family oriented. THANK  YOU for always making us feel at home!!!  Dimmie A Suffridge,,

name: annette Nicholson
text: I have been here now for almost 2 years and the owner Ed has been so much more to my husband and I than a landlord. The camp is full of full timers now and we have no problems. No loud parties or trouble. This is a camping area not a resort like some that have left rude comments seem to think. We feel safe and secure here and having that is worth everything in this world of hate.

name: Sal Biasiucci
text: Its a Nice Camp Ground on the Lake and we can Dock our Boat While we're  There

name: Dinah Rodgers
text: The owners are very friendly and helpful! The people who live here year round are rude. And there was someone in the RV park nextdoor to the camp ground that pulled a gun on people who ask them to slow their boat down so they wouldn’t damage the boats in the Marina.

name: Edward Gullo
text:
Dale B moved in and paid 1 months rent. It took me 3 months of non payment to kick her out and a full week to clean up her trash. The court ruled in my favor.
Jimmy E, a neighbor, tried to commit suicide by shooting himself and failed. A few weeks later, he pulled a knife on me an wanted me to shoot him to finish what he couldn't do. He lost his job and was told never to come back.
Alfred, 'Hank' moved in my 2 friends apartment. After only a couple weeks he had a restraining order put on him  and charged with terroristic threats.
I have been here for over 10 years. As everyone who deals with the public knows, you run into people that just likes to start trouble. I've worked with the public since I was a teenager so I've learned to take the good with the bad.

name: Brett Wyte
text: Stary away from this place no insurance the sewer is running wild the owner is a real nut job he lies try to play the good guy it's fake he allso walks around at night close to your windows late at nite

name: Mindy Broom
text: It has potential but very crowded, if the number of campers were smaller and a bit of landscaping this would be the place to be during the summer months.

name: tn4me 123
text: Horrible place. It is in his backyard. So much junk, old wood, mattresses around. Campers there were from the 80's. Nothing was kept up. Scary place.

name: Tim Smith
text: Did not get to stay here cause of family  emergency . Took our money. This is not how u do  Business . We  canceled a week in advance . The owner never said anything about a  cancellation policy as a matter of a fact said he would hold our check until we came did not do that cashed our check took our money what a POS this man is a crook do not go here. The place looks like a  meth head haven . Stay here at ur on risk

name: Odizzle Elz zido
text: Lake experience is here.

name: Alfred Harding
text: Edward Gullo is a wicked lying thief who stole my stuff and sold it and come a time and place he will pay dearly for his greedy deeds

name: Grayson Love
text: Very rude people, not recomenabl

name: sl smith
text: Nice place

name: Jeffery Bates
text: Big fishing

name: Mitchel Wood
text: Close to the water

name: Samantha Cambron
text: Lovely place!!!!!!!!!

name: Fishingthe 256
text: The MOST beautiful place in Alabama!

name: Digital Dave
text: Fished this lake for almost 50 years.  Used to swim here... not anymore Gators in the lake!

name: Denese Martin
text: Paid for permit no place to fish from land

name: brandon Pinson
text: I have fished this lake my whole life, great place to fish, relax and enjoy nature.

name: Jackson Steward
text: There is giant fish here!

name: Andy Hargrove
text: Great trip with Capt. Patrick!  He was great with my 8 year old, put us on the fish, and made sure we had a good time.  I will definitely book again if we head out to Mobile Bay!

name: Eric Wittig
text: Captain Patrick did an awesome job listening what we wanted to catch on our trip and putting us on a load of fish. The morning definitely flies by when everyone is catching fish and you get to land some fish on a variety of tackle setups. I would highly recommend Ugly Fishing to anyone who is taking a trip down to the coast! Book now, you won’t regret it.

resp.text: Thank you sir for the review and for the business. It’s a real joy for me as a guide for anglers to be able to experience a variety of fish and or tactics. You and your dad did fantastic and I hope to be your guide again in the future.

name: Jamie Lindsey
text: Captain Patrick is awesome.  We had been on 5 trips with him and we always have a great time and catch lots of fish.  His wit and wisdom make the trip very enjoyable

name: Davina Hood
text:
Love our trips out with Captain Patric! He put us on some good fish to catch. We have booked 2 trips with him to date and for sure will book when we come back again. Captain Patric has us spoiled to fishing, which is only made better by family competition!
I definitely recommend using Ugly fishing LLC. This is definitely a new family favorite that our kids look forward to! Thank you for such a great time !

resp.text: Thank you so much for continued business and for the awesome review! It’s a real pleasure to be your family’s fishing guide and I absolutely love the competitive nature.

name: Bryan Viles
text: Captain Patric is a class act. He put us on the fish! We  connected with multiple trophy sized speckled trout! Definitely the guy to call if you’re in the area and looking for an excellent fishing experience.

name: Daniel Barbier
text: I highly recommend Capt. Patric if you’re in the Mobile Bay Area and want to catch fish. I was on a family trip in Dauphin Island and wanted to make a solo trip to try and find some bigger speckled trout and we did just that.  Within 45 minutes of leaving the dock, I had a 22” we each had a 20” in the boat along with some others that were in the 15-18” range.  Overall I was very pleased with the trip, Capt. Patric was very knowledgeable and the boat was really nice.  I’ll definitely be giving him a shout next time I’m in the area. Thanks again Patric!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Daniel! It’s my pleasure to have put you on the fish you were after. I hope you enjoyed your trip to South West Alabama. Please give me a shot again in the future.

name: George Moore
text: This was the best inshore charter. The boys wanted  to catch Shark and man we caught them. Two fifteen year old boy slept good that night.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for the business. It was a real pleasure to serve y’all. The boys were very appreciative of everything which makes my job that much more rewarding. I hope to guide y’all again in the future.

name: Todd McGarrity
text: I have fished with Captain Patric multiple times and have a great experience every time. He is knowledgeable and fun to hang with but most importantly - you can tell he LOVES what he does. Can’t wait to fish with him again soon!

resp.text: I like that I’m fun to hang with 😁! Thank you for the review Todd. I look forward to y’all’s next trip to Mobile Bay.

name: Marc Nations
text: The day fishing with Patrick was great. He put us on fish quickly and took care of us all day. He knows his stuff and he made sure that we knew how to fish successfully. I highly recommend him as a Mobile bay fishing guide.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and thank you for choosing me to be your fishing guide. I hope to be your guide again in the future

name: Victor Menoni
text: Fantastic experience. Patric was very courteous and knowledgeable. Put us right on the fish. Nice haul of redfish and speckled trout. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for booking and for the review! I hope to be your fishing guide again in the future.

name: Vic Wiggins
text: I took my son and grandson Sheephead fishing with Patric and we couldn’t have had a better experience. Patric is extremely knowledgeable and really makes the trip a lot of fun. He put us on the fish immediately and we caught a lot of really nice Sheephead. We all had a great time ! I will definitely be booking another trip with Patric later this year. He’s the best !

resp.text: Thank you for the review Vic. It was a pleasure to show y’all a small portion of the Alabama Coastal fishery. Thank you for booking and I look forward to our next trip.

name: Shane Taylor
text: 20 stars if it would allow it. Our family had a great fishing trip with Captain Patric. We had a family of 5 and his boat accommodated us very well. He worked hard taking us to several spots to get us on some fish. We were able to keep 38 sheepshead and 1 spotted trout.  I really respect how he will meet you at the boat launch that gives us the best shot at catching fish for the day. He's now our choice of charter while visiting the beach. Absolutely will be booking again soon. Thanks Captain Patric for a great day on the water.

resp.text: 20 stars would be awesome and I’d give y’all a 20 star review for being awesome customers! I am looking forward towards our trip you scheduled in March.

name: Beard Face
text: Great fishing trip. Patrick knows where the fish are. We had a great time.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. It was a great pleasure to be your fishing guide today.

name: Cawthon
text: If you want to get put on the fish, Capt Patric Garmeson is the guy.  Already looking forward to our next trip!

resp.text: Thank you Cawthon! I too will be looking forward to our next outing. Thank you for the return business and I will be anxiously awaiting the new baby photos

name: Patrick Bane
text: We had a great father/son trip!  Captain Patric is very knowledgeable and great with kids!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing me to be your fishing guide and thank you for the review! You and Hutton did great! I hope to guide y’all again on future trips.

name: MIKE Stanley
text: Great Captain Chris very personal good guide will come back!!

resp.text: Thank you for booking with us Mike. I’m great full we were able to get Capt Chris to help us with your group.

name: Tommy Lauderdale
text: We always have a great time fishing with Captain Patrick After several years of fishing with him I can say with confidence that you won’t go wrong going with ugly fishing. We always have a great time

name: Chris Stano
text: Had a great time out with Capt. Patrick and we caught fish the whole trip. If you are ever in the Mobile area I would recommend you reach out to him to plan a trip.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for booking with me. I hope to be your guide again some day.

name: Susan Jernigan
text: Had the best day catching trout and sheephead today!! Highly recommend Captain Patrick and Ugly Fishing. First time for trout, catch 8 and had fun with this big sheephead!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Susan! It was a real pleasure to be your fishing guide and to net your fish! Its an honor to know that I guided you to your first speckled trout 😁

name: larry bailey
text:
Been going fishing with Captain Patrick for four years now. Sometimes twice a year. Never disappointed, and have a blast. Best fishing guide around, and I’ll
Never use anyone else. We come from KY just to fish with him. He’ll put you on the fish and it’s an experience you’ll never forget or regret!  You want a fishing trip of a lifetime? Then plan a trip with Captain Patrick @ Ugly fishing !!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for the repeat business. I always enjoy guiding my Kentucky guys! Till next time my friend!

name: Tim Gentzlinger
text: Captain Patric of Ugly Fishing in Mobile Bay Alabama is a top notch fishing guide. He put us on a redfish bite like I have never seen before. He completed my quest to catch a redfish in Alabama within the first 5 minutes of the trip. Very knowledgeable of the area and a pleasure to fish with. Can’t wait to get another day on the water with him. Once again thank you for the memorable day on the bay. Fish on brother 🔥

resp.text: Tim, it was a real pleasure to be your fishing guide. You have know idea how happy I was to be the guy who put you on your first Alabama redfish. Thank you for booking and I hope you can do it again sometime.

name: Greg Pridgen
text: CPT Patric got us on the fish early and kept us on them all day.  He’s very knowledgeable of the area and was fun to be around.  We were able to land a few big Jacks in addition to a few nice Reds, some Specs and White Trout....  we even got an unexpected flounder.  Definitely plan to book him again in the future.

resp.text: Greg I really appreciate the review! I love a nice mixed bag day like y’all had. Thank you for your business and I hope to be your guide again some day.

name: Gail Moore
text: What a great fishing trip with Captain Patrick. Early we caught so many speckled trout we lost count. While we were doing this Tom and George each caught a big bull red. Then it was off to look for more redfish which we found and caught. Captain Patrick was so helpful with instructions and giving us different baits and lures to try when the bite would occasionally slow down. What a fun day. We will definitely book with Captain Patrick again.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mrs. Gail! It was a real treat to be y’all’s fishing guide for the day. I hope to see y’all again.

name: Chris Gurner
text: I have fished with Ugly Fishing for several years now and can say that every year the experience is top notch. If you are looking for a guide service that knows where to fish and how to fish you’ve found it with Patric.

name: Bill Meadows
text: Had a blast fishing for trout, sheephead  and flounder with Captain Patrick. It wasis a very cold day and he didn’t hesitate to take us fishing and show us a great time!

resp.text: Thank you for the review but most importantly thank you for booking with Ugly Fishing! We aim to please 😃

name: Brandon Davenport
text: Had a blast fishing with Capt. Patrick was awesome. I’m not much on fishing but hooking into those jacks was amazing! Never thought I’d have as much fun or stay as busy on fish as we did both days. Going to try and get out there again next year for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Brandon! It’s always a pleasurable day on the water with my boys from Kentucky! I’m pumped the jacks were so cooperative and those snapper were awesome as well!

name: Ian Bjuro
text: I have been fishing over a handful of times with Patric. He is by far the best and most knowledgable guide in the Coastal Alabama area. He will put you on fish!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Ian! Most importantly thank you for the return business!

name: Jacob Chandler
text: I can not say enough good things about Capt Patric Garmeson and Ugly Fishing Charters. Over the last few years my family and I have been on several trips with Patric and not once did we come back without smiles on everyone’s face.  Capt Patric has a true love for his profession and it shows through the knowledge he freely shares with his guests. If you are considering trying Ugly Fishing I suggest you book early because his schedule stays packed!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and the continued support. You are correct I absolutely love my job and the fishery I get to guide on. I love taking the boys fishing but it was nice to actually be your fishing guide this last time around. Till next time my friend.

name: Jacob Chandler
text: I can not say enough good things about Capt Patric Garmeson and Ugly Fishing Charters. Over the last few years my family and I have been on several trips with Patric and not once did we come back without smiles on everyone’s face.  Capt Patric has a true love for his profession and it shows through the knowledge he freely shares with his guests. If you are considering trying Ugly Fishing I suggest you book early because his schedule stays packed!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and the continued support. You are correct I absolutely love my job and the fishery I get to guide on. I love taking the boys fishing but it was nice to actually be your fishing guide this last time around. Till next time my friend.

name: randy white
text: Very knowledgeable of the Mobile Bay.  Taught me techniques and tactics that I didn’t previously utilize.  Highly recommend for anyone from beginner to expert in inshore fishing.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for booking with me. I hope to see you again either as a customer or on the water using the techniques you learned.

name: Marshall Short
text: It got real ugly out there!  He got us on to some monster reds! Patric was great! He has the best boat we've ever been on as well.

resp.text: I love the review! Yes it did get Ugly! Ugly in a good way. Thank you for your business and I hope to be your guide again some day!

name: Chris Graves
text:
Patric kept us busy from the time he picked us up until the time he dropped us back off.
Couldn't have asked for a better day or trip.  My 10 year old son hasn't stopped taking about the 12 foot hammerhead shark!  Highly recommend taking a boat ride with Patric. We will be back.  Thanks again!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! It was a real pleasure guiding y’all on the Gulf. The hammerhead is certainly the highlight of my summer as well.

name: Forrest Meeks
text: My family had a great time fishing with Patrick. Conditions weren't favorable for snapper so he put us on the trout and redfish. He was awesome with my 3 girls ages 9 to 15. Two of which had never been out a charter trip.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and most importantly thank you for choosing Ugly Fishing. The girls were awesome, polite and coachable! It was a real pleasure to guide you and your family on Mobile Bay.

name: Mark Sabol
text: Captain Patric was outstanding, he was patient with the kids, taught the adults a few new things and most importantly, we caught a lot of fish.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Mark. Most importantly, thank you so much for your business!

name: T Tat
text: Patrick is absolutely the best guide! We took my 5 year old nephew with us, he spent the day helping him so we could fish. Caught a bunch of fish, Patrick was very informative and knowledgeable in the different species. Great gear, great guide, great time, cannot wait to get out on the water with him again

resp.text: Thank you for the review. I really love my job which many people can see my passion when we are on the water. Thank you for the kind words.

name: Justin Williams
text: Had a blast with Patric. Highlight of the trip was definitely the hammerhead!! Will book again!!

resp.text: The hammerhead was a highlight of my career! As an inshore/nearshore Captain I don’t carry tackle big enough to handle a shark of that size. It was awesome! Thank you for booking and the awesome review!

name: Dan Walsh
text: Fantastic trip.  Knowledgeable and friendly guide.  Will hire again.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and thank you for choosing me to be your fishing guide.

name: gary roberts
text: We been out with Captain Patric a couple times he always put us on the bite. The last time we went to a natural gas rig, there were multiple boats fishing we had the only boat catching fish. We limited out on red snapper then went after redfish. Captain Patric is very knowledgeable and makes fishing a great experience for everyone. I wouldn't use anyone else for my fishing trips

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experiences. Y’all are a pleasure to guide and it’s an honor to be your only guide! Thank you for the repeat business and I look forward to our next outing. And thanks for stopping by to say hello at the baseball field it was good to see you!

name: gary roberts
text: We been out with Captain Patric a couple times he always put us on the bite. The last time we went to a natural gas rig, there were multiple boats fishing we had the only boat catching fish. We limited out on red snapper then went after redfish. Captain Patric is very knowledgeable and makes fishing a great experience for everyone. I wouldn't use anyone else for my fishing trips

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experiences. Y’all are a pleasure to guide and it’s an honor to be your only guide! Thank you for the repeat business and I look forward to our next outing. And thanks for stopping by to say hello at the baseball field it was good to see you!

name: John Christian
text: Had a great trip with Patric and highly recommend. Patric is extremely knowledgeable and works hard to ensure his clients have a great experience. I can’t wait until our next trip!

resp.text: John, thank you so much for the review and for booking with Ugly Fishing. The boys did great and I hope to be your guide service again one day.

name: kyle lapp
text: Went out on with my 6 year old son and within minutes of being on the boat we were on some speckled trout. After catching many, we moved on to catch some redfish and that didn’t take long either. We both had a great time.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and most importantly thank you for booking with Ugly Fishing. It was a lot of fun helping Eastwood catch fish. I’m so happy the trip was a success.

name: Jeffery Carter
text: We had a blast.  Super knowledgeable guide. Caught a ton of fish and leaned even more along the way

resp.text: Thanks Jeff. I hope to share a little something with my guests each time out. I’m happy to know you were soaking in the info I was sharing.

name: J. Brongo
text: Excellent fishing.  Guide is top notch and the boat is very comfortable and clean.  I would highly recommend Patric to anyone who wants to catch fish!

resp.text: Thank you for the business and the 5 star review. I hope you make it up my way again for a future fishing trip. I’m not 100% sure I can top the results of your first trip but I will certainly attempt to do so.

name: Shane Brooks
text: I have fished all over the country with guides.  Professional & Sincere,  are hard attributes to come by and Patrick has them.  He wasn’t there to take us on a “boat ride” he wanted us to create some memories; And we did! -great job

resp.text:
Creating memories is what I do! Thank you for choosing me to be your fishing
Guide!

name: John Coll
text: Captain Patrick made this fisherman's dream come true. We started with world class Sheep Head and ended up successfully sight fishing for Bull Reds. We caught plenty of quality fish including a state record hooked by Pat. The whole experience was truly memorable.

resp.text: Thank you for the review John and It was an honor to share that day with you. Let’s do it again!

name: David Johnson
text: Best fishing experience I’ve had in years

resp.text: Thanks for the review David and I enjoyed being your fishing guide.

name: Tommy Copeland
text: Captain Patric was awesome my son and I had a blast and left with plenty of reds and specks ..Have done several fishing charters through the years ..Ugly Fishing out shined them all..will recommend it to anyone interested in charter fishing. Captain  was very knowledgeable and personable..thanks for a great time

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Tommy. It was a real treat to be able to provide the service for you and your son. I absolutely loved watching him reel in all those fish!

name: Tamara Akins
text: Absolutely the most fun!!!  Attentive and engaging.  Highly recommend Captain Patrick!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Tamara! I really enjoyed guiding and teaching you and Jerald on how to catch sheepshead.

name: Greg Kennedy
text: Patrick took us out Christmas week and we had a great trip!! The weather was questionable but with Patrick’s local fishing knowledge with cleaned up!! Filled the cooler with speckled trout, white trout, black drum and a redfish! We’ll be frying fish for weekends to come! Thanks for a great memorable trip! Well be back for sure!

resp.text: Greg, thank you for the review and opportunity to guide y’all. I really enjoyed teaching the three of you how to catch the winter time fish in deep water. I hope to be your guide again.

name: Joshua Knight
text: Patrick put us on fish all around the bay! Awesome boat, highly recommend, the man knew his stuff.Thanks again.

resp.text: Josh, thanks for the review! Two things I can always control. 1st my effort into putting customers on fish. 2nd the quality of my equipment. It means a lot that you noticed and that you highly recommend me and my company. Till next time my friend!

name: Vanessa Hale
text: Capt. Patric was great! He took great care of us, even baiting our hooks! Super fun day out on the bay!!! Thanks so much!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Vanessa. Y’all caught some great fish! I hope I can be your captain again someday.

name: Dan L.
text: Captain Patric is a true pro.  He's patient with inexperienced fishermen,  works hard for his clients, gets results, and is simply a pleasure to go fishing with.  Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Dan. It was a real treat to be able to teach Vaughn how to catch a fish.

name: Craig Newton
text: Very knowledgable captain that works hard to keep you on the fish!!

resp.text: Thank you Craig. Trying to learn a little bit each day and pass that along.

name: Ried Baker
text: A very knowledgeable captain. He was able to put us on top of some fish. It was a very good time.

resp.text: Ried, thank you for the review! Your fishing trip was a lot of fun! I’m still amazed by the size of some of the fish y’all caught!

name: Andrew Carpenter
text: Had a blast, and caught a lot of fish. Captain Patric kept us on top of the fish all day, and there was not a dull moment. He taught me a lot about saltwater fishing, and you could immediately tell he loves what he does and is very good at it. I will definitely be back and plan to make it into at least a yearly trip.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Andrew. It’s a real pleasure to take anglers like yourself fishing on Mobile Bay. The bay is my home and I thoroughly enjoy my job.

name: Kevin Gore
text: Went fishing with Captain Jeff yesterday morning. We had a great time catching red snapper, Spanish makrel and a nice jack. Captain Jeff is very knowledgeable of the area and I would highly recommend Ugly Fishing to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Kevin. Jeff is a   New addition to the team and he certainly has his heart in the job. Thanks for choosing Ugly Fishing as your fishing guide service

name: Danielle Davidson
text: We went fishing today with Capt. Patric on the eastern shore of Mobile Bay. Patric is an extremely knowledgeable guide with an affinity for making his anglers feel safe, confident, and fulfilled. We are experienced anglers that are new to the area and feel that we can now head out on the water with a solid plan. Patric is a fantastic teacher, we learned about the area, local techniques, and  seasonal patterns. No questions about recommending Captain Patric to anyone from novice to expert for a great day on the water, he will go above and beyond to make your personal experience the best it can be.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Danielle. It was a great honor to be your fishing guide. You and Nobel are both great anglers and it was a treat to be able to share with you what I have learned over the years.

name: Hank Arnold
text: Fished with Patric for redfish last week. Took some buddies from South Georgia that have fished for trout and redfish their whole lives, Patric impressed them in the delta. Limit of redfish plus trout, drum. lots of catfish and a bass. Lots of action, lots of over slot fish to throw back. Patric never quits, I tell him its like having a buddy with a cool boat that knows how to make it happen! Spent the day "whackin pumpkins". Thanks for the great time, we will be back, the "bucket list" keeps growing. KWE!!

resp.text: Hank, it is about time to go whack some more pumpkins sir! Thank you for the review and the detail you put into it. For those who don’t know a pumpkin is a term used for a redfish that is really orange in color much like a pumpkin. This coloration also tends to show up the most in the fall of the year.

name: Josh Ayers
text: Booked at noon same day last minute and Patrick had no issues taking us out for a few hours. Very patient with the rookies. Would definitely recommend for any bay fishing....

resp.text: Josh, thank you for your review! It is frustrating for me when I have customers calling and I can’t get them on the water. I’m so glad that we were able to work things out.

name: Harrison Balzli
text: Awesome morning out in the delta rivers. Went for reds and had our limit in less than a hour. They were the larger slots as well as quite a few bulls that were tagged and released for another day! Also had a few bags of speckled trout to bring home. Patric was a great host and really knows how to navigate these waters well and find the fish!Thanks for the trip

resp.text: Harrison, thank you for the review! It was a great pleasure to spend the morning with you and your father and I hope to be able to teach you more about Mobile Bay in the future.

name: rhoward2780
text: If you like catching fish, Captain Patric will put you in the middle of the action. Had a great day of catching red fish, speckled trout, and a variety of other fish. Ugly Fishing, LLC is the way to go on Mobile Bay!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review. It was quite enjoyable to teach you how to catch Speckled trout and redfish on artificial lures.

name: Amanda Griswold
text: Amazing!! Patrick is a very well educated guide. He made the trip enjoyable by sharing facts of the surrounding environment, his knowledge about different species of fish, and how to catch them. He did a great job keeping us busy and moving around as needed. As well as being patient, and stepping in to assist with casting if needed. It seemed he would do as little or as much as you wanted him to, and somehow could pick up on it without a word. It was an excellent trip. We asked for Redfish and got the most I’ve ever caught. We will be back to try out more fishing in the spring.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Amanda. I am really glad that we were able to get this trip put together on such short turnaround. Y’all did a great job listening and capitalizing on the bites. Nice work and congrats on catching some great redfish. Check out The post I made on Facebook and Instagram.

name: Jimmy Ray Smith (JRay)
text: On time and ready to catch fish. Patric took great care of us from beginning to end. Caught a bunch of red fish and trout.

resp.text: Your the man Jimmy Ray! Thank you for the review

name: jason pepperman
text: Went out after speckled trout with Patric on New Years Eve morning. He's very knowledgeable about the fish as well as the water we were fishing. He suggested a couple of different hard baits and we got the trout biting. We caught a lot of fish in just a couple of hours and I caught my biggest trout ever that morning. Great trip. Looking forward to going again.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Jason. Teaching people new techniques and strategies while figuring out what the fish want is so much fun. I am very excited about being a part of you landing your trophy speckled trout. I look forward to our next outing.

name: The Barn at Big Oak Hill Ranch
text: We had a great day on the water today with Captain Patric with Ugly Fishing. He was very patient, incredibly knowledgeable of the area, and knew exactly where the fish were biting! We caught our limit on Red Snapper and Speckled Trout. Almost every cast was a bite! He even took great photos and video footage of all the action that we will treasure forever! We highly recommend booking with Ugly Fishing Charters and look forward to booking again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your story with everyone. I really enjoyed spending the day with you and your family and thanks for rescuing me.

name: Patrick Landry
text: This is my second charter fishing trip in Mobile Bay Area. Last year was my 1st & I went with a group charter that was good (3) at best. This trip with Ugly Fishing by Captain Patrick was great. Patrick called fellow colleagues to get the most up to the minute reports where conditions were good for catching desirable fish. He moved around looking for favorable conditions. We limited out on Speckled Trout and caught two 15-20 pound Jack  Crevalle's that were released. He cleaned and bagged our Speckled Trout. It was a Great Trip.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Pat. It’s very important that our clients feel as if they received maximum effort. Some days we can drive straight to the fish and catch them as soon as we begin and other days we have to hunt and peck to find them.

name: Joseph Steele
text: IT BE WAS FUN

resp.text: Thank you for the five star review!

name: Joshua Weaver
text: Took a trip March 2018.  Captain Patric is fantastic.  We did an inshore trip due to the East wind.  We caught a few redfish and trout early on and covered some water.  We then pulled into Weeks Bay and the last couple hours just hammered redfish.  It was a blast.  At one point, we had three on at once.  My kids (2 boys - 9 and 11) called it the best!  Without a doubt recommend Ugly Fishing and Capt Patric.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Josh! The conditions certainly were challenging but I try and roll with the punches that Mother Nature throws our way. I really enjoyed spending the day with you and your family. I hope to fish with y’all again in the future

name: BamaBassFishing TV
text: Booked a trip for speckled trout fishing with Ugly Fishing LLC on 3/4/18 with family and I can honestly say Capt. Patric Garmeson did not disappoint! He is very knowledgeable of the sport and lifestyle of fishing teaching us alot of tips and tricks on how to be better fishermen. He made sure to put us on some fish and make us more than satisfied. He went above and beyond to make sure our only worry was getting our fish to the boat he took care of any entanglement or hooked fish to make sure we got back into the water and fishing asap. We caught our limit on speckled trout and even got into a mess of redfish. We will definitely be booking with Capt. Patric again in the near future! -Chance Mosley

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! It’s our pleasure to provide a memorable experience.

name: Corey Mosley
text:
May 4 2018 I called to schedule my First speckled trout charter with my boys. We were taken out by Captain Patrick.

things started a little slow at first then he put us on some redfish.

we caught a nice mess of fish only keeping 4 nice size reds then we moved around looking for specs with a hit and miss here and there .

We caught  a shark we released.

time moved on and we went to another spot where we started getting hits.

the spec bite turned on and we sat in that one spot and  limited out of some really nice specs.
.
We had a blast out on the water all day

Captain Patrick was very knowledgable teaching us stuff and helping out .

he handled everything  all we had to do was fish.

We hooked up three and four specs at once multiple times  he definitly worked hard keeping our baits in the water to catch more fish

I will defintily be goin back again lots of fun to be had when fishing with him. Corey .

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Ugly Fishing to be your fishing guide provider. Captain Patric strives for a high quality fishing and on the water experience. We hope to work with you and your family again.

name: Bill Holland
text: Had a fantastic trip today with Ugly Fishing. Caught redfish, sheepshead and some of the largest speckle trout we've ever seen. Cptn. Patric was super, even when my grandson and his buddy (both 15) got lines tangled. We saw other boats struggling, but we got the fish. We HIGHLY recommend Ugly Fishing. Bill from Brandon Ms.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Bill. I enjoyed watching the boys catch fish and don't you worry about the tangled lines because they will happen almost everyday. I hope that we can do it again.

name: Arrow Networking (Carl)
text:
I have fished with some other fishing guides but Patric with Ugly Fishing has to be the most versatile fisherman there is on the Gulf Coast. Twice I booked at charter at two different locations we were vacationing at, once at lower Mobile Bay and the other time at Dauphin Island. How he can find fish to catch no matter where he is amazes me!
The other time we have been fishing with Patric was on Christmas Eve day, wind blowing, cold, but we filled the cooler with delicious white and speckled trout!
Don't think the price of the Ugly Fishing's charters are expensive. Patric works hard to make sure you have a great time and he has quite a lot of money tied up in his boat and tackle.
Patric is a humble guy but he is top-notch in my opinion. Whether you are a seasoned fisherman or a first timer, don't hesitate to give Patric a call.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for the review Kyle. I look forward to our next trip.

I enjoy learning the entire Mobile Bay and northern Gulf Coast to ensure that I can provide a very memorable fishing experience for all of our clients. Alabama may have a small coast line but we have a tremendous amount of high quality fishing.

name: Jason Haas
text: Just Passing on several people's opinions.

resp.text: Thanks for the recommendation pal!

name: Ramonalesa Fifth
text: I love this place I use to live here and I should have stayed here looking for a good place to go and camp with a view check it out one of the best owners you will ever meet a beautiful caring soul

name: lydia lee
text: Very nice place. It has a nice family feel to it.

name: Crystal Madru
text: Great place to relax and unwind!

name: KJ Aubrey
text:
The owner was friendly over the phone at first, but I feel that she could have been more up front about the nature of her place. That would have saved us a wasted 23 mile trip both ways. Waterloo is a beautiful place, but I would rather stay on the free TVA land than at this so-called campground. The campground is actually a trailer park with some spots for camping. We stay in many campgrounds, some better than others, but this is the first time we have driven through a campground and left. I could not even find the camp office to begin with and everybody at the trailer park was staring us down when we drove through.

When I couldn't find the office, I called the owner back to tell her we had changed our minds. She did not answer her phone. I got a phone call later on from a different number and it was the owner. I let her know that her park was not what we expected and that we had changed our minds. She got an attitude with me and said, "Thanks for letting me know. I waited for you for over an hour." I then informed her that I had tried to call and she didn't answer. I did not bother to mention that she wasted an hour of my time and the gas that I used to drive to her disappointment of a trailer park that she is trying to pass off as a campground. If you do decide to camp in Waterloo, I would suggest that you turn right on the road before you cross the bridge into town and stay on the TVA land. It is well maintained, peaceful and it is free.

resp.text: I am sorry that our campground was not what you expected. Our property is 2 businesses, a small campground on the water with bathhouse, boat launch, fishing dock. The main portion are Lake lots that we lease yearly for vacation sites. It's not unusual for people to turn in the wrong drive; I keep meaning to get new signs but since my husband died in March I've been trying to juggle the whole thing alone. After we spoke, I did see that you had called the office number, which is supposed to be transferred to my cell phone. So I called you at 6:10 and we both missed each other. I apologize for my shortness, I have no excuse for that except that 14 hour days, 7 days a week sometimes gets me overwhelmed.   I'm usually pretty nice.  Our campground is usually not full in the fall, and the weather is perfect for camping. If you ever decide to reconsider camping with electric, water , and hot showers, I would be glad to make up to you your "wasted 23 mile round trip". Thank you for your review.

name: Michelle McFall
text: Great place for sunsets and sunrise over the TN river. And eagle watching !

name: Mary Morrison
text: Been going to this campground for 13 years....it is like family and going home. We camp at many different campgrounds from private to state parks and they all offer different amenities.  At Hart it is shaded, beautiful views of the water, hot showers and friendly people...the owner treats everyone like family...we love Harts

resp.text: You are family! Thank you!

name: RV Mobile Repair, LLC
text: A beautiful place to camp along the Tennessee River. Everyone seems really friendly there.  If you're there and you need some RV work call662 me306 at0937

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Lee Hemming
text: We were greeted by the very helpful and friendly owner. The views are beautiful, however with the description and great reviews, we expected a little more. This is more like a rustic fishing camp. It was recommended that we not use the coffee maker and the microwave at the same time. Yikes! 30 amp service is old. Picnic tables need help. Grass sites. Also there was a dog roaming in the park that was unfriendly, so we didn't feel comfortable having ours out and about. Paid $17 for the night, a fair price, probably. With a few upgrades, this could really be a hidden gem. Grocery and dining not close, so bring what you need.

resp.text: Thank you for staying with us, Mr. Hemming. Your review is pretty accurate, upgrading our electric and some cosmetic work on the tables etc have been in our plans. We actually met with the Utility Company last year , and are still waiting on their approval of the plans . The campground sites were built in the 1970's, and RV requirements have definitely changed since then. We do have some 50amp service, I'm sorry I did not show you those sites. I hope we will be able to get to work on that soon, and that when we do, you will come see us if you ever swing south again!

name: Fred Pearson
text: The most beautiful location,  and the owners and the friendliest people you would ever meet anywhere.

resp.text: Thanks Fred and Darlene!

name: Rich Singh
text: Hart Park is the most wonderful place on Earth. I want to live there, the Hart's are the nicest people and it's a wonderful place to stay visit at once .

resp.text: Thank you, Richard!! Come Back Soon - we miss you!

name: Sheila Gilbert
text: Considering a purchase of a place here, it's looking like it's going to happen! I love the idea of having a waterfront summer place again.

resp.text: Thank you Sheila! We hope you and Rick decide to have your vacation home with us!

name: Ricky Franks
text: Great place for a family fishing and camping trip.

resp.text: Thank You! Hope to see you again soon!

name: Cricket Hanback
text: Great camping on lake in WATERLOO

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Ramona Fifth
text: I use to live here love being near the water I miss it.

name: Carol Diane Poole
text: Its a pretty place

name: Donna Robbins
text: Peaceful on river

name: Kirt Daniel
text: Beautiful

name: Tammy Woods
text: Not taken care of.

resp.text: I'm so sorry you found us lacking, Ms. Woods. When did you camp with us? We try to maintain our Campground  to please all of our campers.  I hope you will let us know when you camp with us again and perhaps we can go over your concerns and make your stay more enjoyable! Thank you for your input.

name: John Yarbrough
text: Great place to camp and fish also a well stocked store

name: Steve Haney
text: Nice quiet place! Beautiful!

name: Cowboy Blue
text: Everyone was polight and helpful.very clean.and hospitable. You've got to go there the waterfall is breathtaking.and also have kiack rental there to.good fishing, awesome swimming and boat launches.

name: John White
text: Great getaway

name: Marvin Clay
text:
Stopped by bc friend broke down on jet ski that lived on opposite side of lake  they let me use their boat ramp for free
Little things like that add up friendly people will recomend them again

name: Pam Russell
text: We just got our spot today looking forward to meeting all you folks this spring🤣😂

name: Scott Simpkins
text: Visited a friend there...now looking for a spot to call mine! Great location to decompress and get away from the bright lights and big box stores!!!

name: Eugene Roos.
text: Really nice place, staff is super friendly, the facility is nice, good fishing, and all the campers/neighbors are super friendly.

name: Darrell Weaver
text: Great Place Great People.

name: Opal Wilder
text: Love the family place

name: Terry Hill
text: I love it ok

name: Kay Magin
text: Love this campground

name: Jeremy Locklear
text: Friendly

name: Daniel Duke
text: Nice quiet family Run Campground

name: CAMO 9513
text: Needs more stuff to do there

name: Joey Duncan
text: We had an awesome trip. The people are awesome to just sit and talk with, and they are very knowledgeable on fishing and extremely knowledgeable on the area. Highly recommend.

name: MyFathers TwoAcres
text: Great place.  Very friendly service from a knowledgeable staff.  Will be back very soon.

name: Andrew Farrow
text: I stopped by on a trip to Sipsey fork. They have an amazing selection of flies and other items you may need for a trip. The guys here are extremely knowledgeable and are happy to chat with you for a while and give you some good recommendations for what you may need for any fishing trip. They also know and provide the dam schedule which was fantastic for planning a trip since you don't want to drive all the way out here just to find out you won't be able to fish cause the dam is generating.

name: Clay Gary
text: Had a great time. Guides were super nice. Highly recommend.

name: Rick Mason
text: Had a great time with Brandon our guide!  He knows where to find big Rainbow Trout!

name: Bryan Jenkins
text: Had an awesome morning being guided by MC. She did a wonderful job of teaching us the basics and it was my son’s first time. Needless to say he is now “hooked”.

name: Keith Crouch
text:
Great experience with Brandon as our guide.  My Father-in-law and myself are rookies in the fly fishing world.  Brandon is a great teacher and is very patient!  I will definitely be back and encourage anyone that loves to fish to give these guys a try and definately check them shop out!
Keith Crouch

name: James Huff
text:
We had a great time discovering and catching Rainbow trout for the first time!  The guided instruction was useful and memorable for future  use.......we intend to fish more.  All services were as advertised.  I am definitely planning to return with all the guys.

I would go to the fly shop first before going to the water.  I am glad that we got some instruction first before going on our first Rainbow trout trip!

name: Jason Cheney
text:
Extremely friendly and knowledgeable family.
They absolutely love to talk fishing.
Bought waders and boots for my wife and they took all the time she needed to make the right choice for her.

While my wife was trying on the waders & boots I learned a few things I was doing wrong chasing stripers on the lake from Mary Carole. Who incidentally just finished a guide trip with a client that landed a 20" rainbow!

Brandon and Mary run a great shop. Plenty of fishing gear and tying supplies.
They're quite a ways from our place in arley but I, and now my wife, really enjoy getting down there when we can.

Highly recommended whether you're a complete newbie or a seasoned veteran.

name: Tyler Hunter
text: Outstanding fly shop. They are very willing to teach or help you with anything related to becoming a better angler. I learned a lot of good stuff from Randy and Brandon.

name: Joseph Wolf
text: Quality service and instruction

name: Anthony Josey
text: Outstanding customer service, went above and beyond to make sure I found what I needed.

name: Carl Cathey
text: I stopped by outside of their normal business hours, and they were very accommodating.  Great folks, I'll go back for sure!

name: Connor Baker
text: Love this place! If you want to learn about Smith Lake or Sipsey Fork, book a guide trip with Brandon, he knows what he is talking about and it is a blast! I also have purchased two rods here.  Randy was very helpful and helped me find the right rod for what I wanted to fish! Can't recommend enough! Great shop and great people!

name: Leah Rasbury
text: We did the 11 mile trip yesterday and it was really nice! The staff was very friendly and knowledgeable and the shop itself is so awesome! Definitely a highlight, was playing Bama Cab in the van on the ride back to the shop after our trip!!! I would definitely recommend this place to my friends and family!

name: Shawn Stevens
text: Great service and advice on fishing and supplies needed. Super friendly staff! Will definitely come back for a guided fishing trip!

name: Taylor Hall
text:
Cannot recommend this place enough! Booked a half-day wading trip to start learning how to fly fish and it was even better than I had hoped for!

Brandon is a fantastic guide who was incredibly patient and broke everything down in a very straight forward manner, making it easy to make decent casts and start working to get better. He took the time to teach us stuff so that we could come back and fish on our own.

You can tell he his guide service is VERY kid friendly!

I cannot wait to work on the stuff he taught us and take another trip to get additional instruction!

****edited: I was able to work my way back on my own to fish the same river and caught two beautiful rainbows on my own! Second trip fly fishing and I have to give credit to the guiding service because without the initial lesson I wouldn’t have figured it out so quick!!!

name: Jacob Maples
text: Great selection on everything from flies, rods, reeds, and outerwear. Awesome people who know the water and are more then willing to help.

name: Pat combs
text: Wonderful, owner helped us out a lot on Places to go.Hot slots!!

name: John Bibow
text: L@@@@llaall//well stocked, professional,  and helpful

name: Brandon White
text: Great people! I’ve made the drive from Birmingham multiple times to shop here. Most memorable was buying my first fly outfit and getting some great casting instruction. Highly recommended.

name: David Davis
text: Great folks!!!! Hospitable and friendly!!! Thanks as always!

name: Bo Turner
text: I want to give a big shout out to the guys at Riverside Fly Shop.  Yesterday I went out with the owner Brandon Jackson for a little private instruction and my first try at fly fishing.  These guys are incredibly helpful and patient with a clumsy beginner like me.  If you’re a fisherman and want to try something different or if you are a beginner and just want to give it a try I recommend these guys highly.  This would also be an awesome Christmas gift for an outdoorsy person.  It’s also worth the drive to stop by and take a look around their shop or ask questions.  Thanks Randy and Brandon for all the help!  I had a blast.

name: Vicki Raynes
text: Our vacation here was wonderful. We camped here and the site was very secluded. The owner of the shop was very informative about the best places on the Sipsy River to fly fish and what flies to use.  The view was wonderful and the River was beautiful. A great place to have a very private vacation.

name: Jon Nash
text: My wife surprised me with a guided trip on Fathers Day, and I learned more in that 4 hours than all of my previous fly fishing trips combined. Excellent, personalized, and patient instruction, and super fun. Brandon is the Bill Nye the science guy of guides, with the temperament of a monk. I had the time of my life. I left with a wealth of knowledge and stocked up on quality equipment at Riverside before heading home to Birmingham.

name: Clint Rice
text: This place has everything u need to fly fishing ,,,they even do tours to teach you how to fish ,,,the spot is perfect place to fish and beautiful as can be

name: Lee McKibben
text: Great experience. These guys really know fly fishing. Try one of their guided trips for rainbow trout. We did and had a great time!!

name: L J Donelson
text: The pros!  Great guide trips and lessons, prices are just right, and the staff are friendly.

name: Clint Rice
text: This place has everything u need to fly fishing ,,,they even do tours to teach you how to fish ,,,the spot is perfect place to fish and beautiful as can be

name: M Ashley
text: Great shop, better than many I have been to out west. Very helpful on what the fish are biting, caught fish on exactly what was recommended by them. Highly recommend.

name: Scott Lysle
text: It is a decent little shop.  They have pretty good tying materials and they do have kayaks to rent.

name: Ron Sparkman
text: Brandon was a great guide.  He taught us how to fish and where to fish.  We caught several and had a great time.  I highly recommend them!

name: Mark Howard
text: Brandon is an amazing guide!  Friendly and talented.  His expertise is absolutely wonderful. Visiting Riverside Fly Shop is a must for fly fishing enthusiasts.

name: JJ Yount
text: Great folks, great shop. Being new to the area and fly fishing, the guided trip was great for me. Randy helped me work on my skills and helped me learn the river.

name: Rick Carroll
text: Very knowledgeable staff if you are willing to learn,knows a very lot about the sipsey fork and fly fishing in general,just ask Randy or Brandon and they will let teach you everything they know!!

name: Nathan Purvis
text: Randy & Brandon are always a pleasure to see & do business with.

name: Danny Roberts
text: Nice to have experts on fishing if they say try this bet on it

name: Virginia Blackwood
text: Fantastic people! Great experience! Well stocked.

name: Steve Hawkins
text: If you want to catch trout in the south, this is where you need to be. The folks at the shop know this river and they know trout. The shop is outstanding for beginner and seasoned trout bums like myself. Drove all the way from maine not only to catch trout but to visit with randy. He knows flyfishing!

name: Tangy Bodie
text: The owner took time to talk to us about fly fishing and the other goodies they offer. Really neat shop and Beautiful scenery!

name: Shannon Franks
text: Fantastic service and knowledge of fly fishing not only in their area but anywhere in the state of Alabama and surrounding states. If you like to fly fish or want to learn , this is the fly shop to visit!!

name: Tina Aaron
text: We had 14 people today do the 11 mile canoe trip and had wonderful service.

name: junk can
text: Having been involved in recreational boating or commercial shipping nearly my whole life of almost 50 years, I can eagerly attest that Nelson Boatyard is a bright spot in the South for commercial and recreational boaters to service their vessels!  The very affordable rates make the location a win to begin with.  The massive capacity of this large and expanding boatyard is another positive, though they graciously made room for me even in the midst of the fallout of Hurricane Sally .  However, perhaps the best aspect of the facility are the brilliant array of professionals associated with it who are able to attend to any matter that one might face.  Though I intended to perform all the work on my boat, I was delighted to find both excellent, generous guidance and reliable, experienced service providers to attend to all my needs that were beyond my own capacity.  I suppose that is to be expected from a business operated by four generations of one family!   I will be gladly returning from Pensacola for routine maintenance every two years!

name: John Lanier
text: Awesome

name: Matt White
text: Very nice and fair people! Great Price for good work!

resp.text: Thanks!
